pkgmetadata.longdescription: Health Metrics and the Spread of Infectious Diseases // A collection of datasets and supporting functions accompanying Health Metrics and the Spread of Infectious Diseases by Federica Gazzelloni (2024). This package provides data for health metrics calculations, including Disability-Adjusted Life Years (DALYs), Years of Life Lost (YLLs), and Years Lived with Disability (YLDs), as well as additional tools for analyzing and visualizing health data. Federica Gazzelloni (2024) doi:10.5281/zenodo.10818338.
